module geometry

convenience geometry functions for pyrosetta poses

geometry.get_rcm(pose)

convenience function returning center of mass of pose as numpy.array

Parameters:

pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

Returns:

center of mass of pose

Return type:

numpy.array shape (3,)

geometry.rotate_x(pose, theta_deg)

rotates pose around x-axis over theta_deg degrees

Parameters:

pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

geometry.rotate_y(pose, theta_deg)

rotates pose around y-axis over theta_deg degrees

Parameters:

pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

geometry.rotate_z(pose, theta_deg)

rotates pose around x-axis over theta_deg degrees

Parameters:

pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose
